content.title: As an observer, which of the five requirements for achieving accurate first-round fire for effect are you solely responsible for?
Which  asset provides the commander flexibility, range, speed, lethality, precision and the ability to mass fires at a desired time and place?
Observers equipped with nothing more than a map, binoculars, and compass typically have a mean target location error of about how many meters?
True/ False: The AH-64 is equipped with 30mm, 2.75-inch rockets, and Hellfires
